```{r setup}
library(whereami)
library(texPreview)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r}
tex_opts$set(returnType = 'html')
```

## LaTeX caption

```{r}
tab <- xtable::xtable(head(iris,10))
xtable::caption(tab) <- paste0(xtable::sanitize(whereami()),collapse = ', ')
texPreview::tex_preview(tab,fileDir = getwd())
```

## HTML footnote

```{r}
knitr::kable(head(iris,10), align = "c",format = 'html') %>%
  kableExtra::footnote(
    general_title = "Source: ",
    general = as.character(whereami(path_expand = TRUE)))
```
